input.sentences: i had the best time at the organization theme park .
i went on some amazing rides .
i even got to see beauty and the beast live .
output.sentences: We travelled to disneyland paris and our first stop was as the hardrock cafe
Next we went to visit the characters out of monster inc
Then we tried out some of the fantastic rides
Afterwards we wandered round and explored and took lots of pictures
Later that day we watched a live beauty and the beast show.
